Text: THE FINANCE AND ECONOMIC SECTOR Madam Speaker, I am proud to report that the country's economic growth has generally strengthened, while inflation has now moderated. For the past two years the economy grew by 4.8% in 2017 and improved to 6.5% in 2018. Balance of payments (BoP) estimates indicate that the current account deficit narrowed to 1.5 percent of GDP in the first half of 2019 compared to a deficit of 1.7 percent of GDP in the corresponding quarter in 2018.
Cause: THE FINANCE AND ECONOMIC SECTOR Madam Speaker, I am proud to report that the country's economic growth has generally strengthened, while inflation has now moderated.
Effect: For the past two years the economy grew by 4.8% in 2017 and improved to 6.5% in 2018.
